backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the CertiPrep AI backend with data types and CRUD operations for domains, objectives, key terms, ports, protocols, questions, test results, and flashcards across multiple certifications.
backend/migration.mo: Motoko migration module that upgrades flashcard state by adding an `id` field to each flashcard entry when migrating from the old actor schema to the new one.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON file containing one-sentence summaries of key frontend source files including QAPractice, Flashcards, PracticeTest pages, global CSS, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes covering colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the CertiPrep AI React app, mounting the app into a `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, CertificationSelector, StudyMode, QAPractice, Flashcards, and PracticeTest pages wrapped in a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/FlashcardDeck.ts: Reusable flashcard component with flip animation, progress display, and correct/incorrect action buttons that appear after the card is revealed.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component providing a sticky header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation links, and an AI-ready status indicator wrapping all page content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceControls.ts: Voice controls UI component integrating text-to-speech and speech recognition hooks, with a status bar, mic toggle button, interim transcript display, and an expandable settings panel for voice/rate/pitch configuration.
frontend/src/data/certifications.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and a large static data array for IT certifications (e.g., CompTIA A+), including exam metadata, domains, objectives, key terms, ports, protocols, and study notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for CRUD operations on flashcards, questions, and test results by calling the ICP backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Recognition API to provide start/stop controls, live interim transcripts, and final transcript state for voice input.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Synthesis API that loads and ranks English voices, strips Markdown from text before speaking, and exposes controls for voice selection, rate, pitch, and stop.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines a dark academia OKLCH color theme with CSS variables, and adds custom utility classes for card flip animations, wave bars, gradients, glows, and navigation links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack Query's QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationSelector: Page component that displays a grid of available CompTIA certifications from static data, showing each cert's difficulty, exam code, passing score, question count, duration, and domain previews with links to study/flashcard/test routes.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that lists all certifications as cards, each showing the latest test score progress fetched via useGetTestResults, with quick-action links to Study, Flashcards, and Test routes for each certification.
frontend/src/pages/Flashcards.tsx: Flashcard study page with three phases (setup, study, review) that lets users generate new cards from certification data or load saved ones, tracks correct/incorrect answers, saves cards to the backend, and displays a results summary with filtering.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeTest.tsx: Timed practice test page with setup, test, submitting, and results phases that generates multiple-choice questions from certification data, runs a 30-minute countdown timer, records answers, submits scores to the backend, and shows a detailed review of results.
frontend/src/pages/QAPractice.tsx: React page for a Q&A practice quiz supporting setup, quiz, and review phases with domain filtering, answer feedback, and pass/fail result tracking for a given certification.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMode.tsx: React page implementing an AI instructor chat interface for certification study, with domain-aware response generation, text-to-speech, and speech recognition support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark academic theme with custom OKLCH color palettes (navy, amber, electric), typography/container-query plugins, and extended border radius and shadow tokens.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing CertiPrep AI's architecture, existing features, known issues, and versioned feature list for a CompTIA certification study app with AI Q&A, voice, flashcards, and progress tracking.
